user.activity.note.accessReader: Click the '+' by your name to begin
user.activity.message.readinglog.full.wi: You've won the following prize for completing 10 hours of reading: [1]. \nKeep tracking your reading to earn more reading badges!
user.activity.message.readinglog.full: Keep tracking your reading to earn more reading badges!
user.activity.message.activityGrid.rowOr: You've won the following prize for completing 4 activity squares in a row: [1].\nPlease visit your local San Jose Public Library to claim your prize. \nComplete the entire activity grid for a chance to win more prizes!
user.activity.message.activityGrid.black: For completing all activities, you've won : [1]. \nThe library will contact you if you win. Please make sure you have a valid phone number or email listed on your account.
user.activity.message.activityGrid.instr: Complete activities in any 4 squares in a row (vertical, horizontal, or diagonal) to win a prize.\nComplete all activities to be entered into prize drawings.
user.activity.message.prizeGrid.instruct: Keep track of your total time spent reading and prizes earned.\nVisit your local San Jose Public Library to pick up prizes. The library will contact you if you win a prize drawing.
user.activity.message.batteryGrid.instru: For every 20 minutes you read, click 'ADD 20 Minutes'\nRead for 10 hours to reveal special artwork and win a prize.
